p:
A repeated measures ANOVA revealed a significant improvement of ocean acidification knowledge scores after comparing pre- [ M = 2.70, SE = 0.24; 95% CI (2.22, 3.18)] and post-test scores [ M = 3.63, SE = 0.14; 95% CI (3.35, 3.91)], [ F (1, 42) = 22.95, p < 0.001,

= 0.35]. There was no main effect of locomotion technique on the change in knowledge scores, however [ p = 0.73, d = 0.11].
